column3: School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
column5: From authoring definitive text books on chemical engineering to finding solutions to the world's water shortages, Swansea University has a proud tradition delivering pioneering innovative process engineering solutions.Our research builds on established process engineering areas with application to energy, health, food, water and the environment.There is a wide range of research at Swansea University. This includes:
column7: Please visit our website for the Bioprocess Engineering research programme fee information.
